name: Dimitris Makrakis
content: Your name Professor Dimitrios Makrakis Research Interests: Wireless and Optical Networks: Scheduling, Routing, Traffic Engineering Pervasive Computing Ad Hoc and Sensor Networks QoS Supporting Technologies Security for Wireless Networks Ultra Wideband Systems and Networks Other links ELG5374: Computer Communications ELG5122:  Modeling, Analysis and Performance Evaluation in Computer Networks CEG3185: Introduction to Computer Networks CEG4186: Wireless Mobile Networks CEG4188: Higher Layer Network Protocols CEG4190:  Computer Networks Design PERSONAL Dimitrios Makrakis School of Information Technology and Engineering (SITE), University of Ottawa 800 King Edward Avenue, P.O.
